name: The Apothecary's Apprentice
description:
Play as Kidd, a young goat who works at a potion shop. You've been tasked with gathering some rare potion ingredients for the shop. Explore three unique levels as you search for ingredients.

There are leaves spread across the levels that can be collected. Each level contains enemies, hazards and platforming challenges. Use all of Kidd's movement options to explore and collect leaves.

 Movement 

Swing from branches and other objects using your scarf as a rope!

You can glide by holding your scarf above your head.

You carry a bag full of potions that can be thrown at enemies to defeat them.

Explore using all of Kidd's abilities!

Controls

Controls for different actions can be seen in-game by selecting 'View Controls' from the bottom of the options menu. The main controls are also explained through gameplay.

You will need a keyboard and mouse.
